This is but a ripple in a pond, but at least it's a start to something with huge potential.

lenders.loan_because: in the developed world we spend so much money on indifferent things and now it's time to spend it where it actually makes a difference!

lenders.name: Liz Cappon
lenders.loan_because:
I really feel this type of help is inspiring and motivating to all involved.

Your average joe just doesn't see the direct connection & effects when making a small charitable donation.  And of course there is often the perceived threat of blatant mismanagement of funds by organizations.

With Kiva you avoid these pitfalls and make a real difference using real dollars which would be considered small-time by any other non-profit.

Not to mention the fact that the same small amount of funds can repaid to be used over & over again, it really is the gift that keeps on giving.

That is why Kiva is my favorite non-profit organization.
lenders.occupational_info:
I work to publicize & promote businesses using more unique methods than traditional advertising offers, working with the news media & social networking.

When I have free time (I wish I had more! LOL) I enjoy just hanging out with my friends, traveling and playing Texas Hold Em Poker.

My interests include politics, celebrity & how it has effected media and Hip Hop & Dance music.

lenders.name: Majd
lenders.loan_because:
i think giving people the opportunity to raise themselves out of poverty will do 2 things: 
1- help end poverty on a more personal level
2- preserve the dignity of the people i'm trying to help, because "dignity is more important to the human spirit than wealth" - Jacqueline Novogratz
lenders.occupational_info: I am involved with Engineers Without Borders - Canada, trying to create a world of opportunity.

lenders.name: Erick
lenders.loan_because: Humanity needs hope.

lenders.name: Sage Media Design Co
lenders.loan_because:
We feel very fortunate to live and work in Canada, and we have seen first-hand the need for a service such as this one.

Sage Media is very proud to support Kiva in helping those who would help themselves.
lenders.occupational_info: Sage Media is a corporate graphic design company, catering to organizations, entrepreneurs and business start-ups around the world.

lenders.name: Margie
lenders.loan_because:
Hi I am 41 and a single mother of 2 wonderful teenagers. Today I am here to make a request to change my families financial future. I have met a young man by the name of Shea Korte who is a online business consultant. What he does is help other people make money on the internet and lots of it. The business Shea is involved in is called Abunza and this business is taking the internet by storm! Shea is in the top 20 of the Abunza leader board, actually he is number 10. So he is the tenth highest income earner in Abunza so that says alot. The reason I am talking about Shea is beacause he will be my mentor he is going to show me every step of his success so it can become my success. Abunza is the business to get into, it can change my financial future for my family. Attached to my request are videos and links about the business PLEASE check them out so you can see for yourself this business really can change my families future! I need to find a way to get out of the financial crisis I am in so I can support my family and be able to supply their needs. And I know I have found it with Abunza all I need is the start up costs and I will work my tail off to be highly successful! It is my dream to be able to pay ALL my bills on time not pick and choose which ones get paid. It is my dream to go to the mall and buy my children clothes when they need it instead of waiting for a miracle. I dont want my family to go through another eviction from our home it is so painful for them when we get kicked out cause mom cant pay the rent.  I want to be self sufficient and support my family completely on my own that is my wish! PLEASE help me change my life and most importanly my childrens lifes. After my success I want to give back to others so I can help mothers that have gone through the same struggles as I have. Thank you so much for reading my request and I pray everyone that reads this request has a blessing from our Lord and Savior! 
God Bless You,
Margie(Mother of 2) 

I need $1197 dollars to start my business.

P.S. Please make sure you check out the videos and links so you can see the documentation. Thank you in advance for helping me on the road to success!!
lenders.occupational_info:
Here are the video links and website links to see for yourself how successful Abunza is!

http://sheakorte.abunza.com/video.html

http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=PSk7s8OfBys

http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=UX5jL4eJgog

lenders.name: Del
lenders.loan_because: To help others help themselves.

lenders.name: David
lenders.loan_because: I have been very blessed and want to be able to make a difference in the lives of others as well. It is a small world, getting smaller all the time, and we are all in it together. We need to help each other.

lenders.name: Doreen & Doug.
lenders.loan_because: It is much more blessed to give than to receive
lenders.occupational_info: retired

lenders.occupational_info: I worked before as an Operation manager in the production of  a Flow measure instruments compagny. I am now retired.

lenders.name: Deb
lenders.loan_because: sometimes one needs a little help to get started or move forward with a project.  I feel so blessed that I can offer a little help where it's needed.
lenders.occupational_info: I train dogs to help people with physical disabilities (many cannot walk, for example).  The dogs help their owners by retrieving things that are out of reach, tugging open doors, and turning on light switches.

lenders.name: Ted
lenders.occupational_info: I work to change our society and our government through democracy, by helping people who are running for (or already in) political office, and by working on political issues.

lenders.name: Grant

lenders.occupational_info: I lend money to people to buy their first house.  I also help them achieve their financial goals, and point them in the right direction

lenders.name: Caroline
lenders.loan_because: I'd like to make a difference and helping people to help themselves seems to be a much better way than doling out endless buckets of aid that can end up not reaching the people who need it.
lenders.occupational_info: I help hospitals, nursing homes and other health organisations to implement software for looking after patient records and care plans.

lenders.name: Duffy
lenders.loan_because: aid works better when the recipient has a vested interest. Allowing third-world economies to improve their own living conditions will do more to end disease and hardship than handouts ever will.

lenders.name: Sue & Pete
lenders.loan_because: We want to help others who are motivated towards improving thier lives and becoming self sufficient.
